Text:
Thank you Despo! Do you know if they announced how many Eps the Season 1 will have? Just wondering if it will be a 12 and 12, first half of the season, and second half, in equal amounts...? 

Also, anyone else really like the art design for this new 'reinvention' of Thundercats? I for one think if it very well done. Thx again Despo!
